groups.name: spring.python.cache
groups.description: Configuration properties for Python caching mechanism across executors and resolvers.

groups.name: spring.python.cache.name
groups.description: Configuration properties defining cache names for each cache segment.

groups.name: spring.python.cache.key
groups.description: Configuration properties defining cache key generation behavior.

properties.name: spring.python.cache.enabled
properties.description: Whether the Python cache autoconfiguration is enabled.

properties.name: spring.python.cache.levels
properties.description: Defines which parts of the Python processing flow are cached.

properties.name: spring.python.cache.name.file-paths
properties.description: Cache name for storing resolved Python file paths.

properties.name: spring.python.cache.name.file-bodies
properties.description: Cache name for storing Python file contents (script bodies).

properties.name: spring.python.cache.name.resolver
properties.description: Cache name for storing resolved Python scripts

properties.name: spring.python.cache.name.executor
properties.description: Cache name for storing Python executor cached responses.

properties.name: spring.python.cache.name.processor
properties.description: Cache name for storing Python processor cached responses.

properties.name: spring.python.cache.key.hash-algorithm
properties.description: Hash algorithm used to generate cache keys (e.g., SHA-256, MD5).

properties.name: spring.python.cache.key.charset
properties.description: Charset used to encode cache key components before hashing.

properties.name: spring.python.cache.key.delimiter
properties.description: Delimiter used between cache key parts during concatenation.
